resources.string: Uh uhhh....U know it\'s the 21st century, We can\'t do without the INTERNET...

Once Upon a time.......A few mistakes ago, during a time when there was nothing like the internet, man lived happily. People actually visited people to find out if they were fine. Then the Internet came to destroy it all......... Excerpt from "The Internet: mankind's shadow enemy or saviour in flesh?" - Rafsanjani Abdul Aziz Yaah Waduudu
